data.text: @pythonsnake So im not impressed with talks of "prison reform" when his actions are ensuring racial domination and injustice in the court system. Everyone he appointed is young, white, male & conservative. Like old days. These are lifelong appointments, they won't die for decades. #MAGA /2

@pythonsnake You dont see a difference in all white court rooms & courts with black judges? We already know white people give harsher sentences to black people for the same crimes committed by white people. Thurgood Marshall was progress. Black judges & women judges are progress. Thats gone.
@pythonsnake To be continued. I gotta go to sleep.
@pythonsnake 4) He got Betsy Devos to gut the laws punishing con artists who steal tuition money from the gullible by opening fake schools like Trump University and giving the students fake degrees.

@pythonsnake 3) He used Ben Carson to erase all of the housing protections that Obama implemented to prevent discrimination. Housing Discrimination laws are weak again. Im sure he did this since he was sued for refusing to rent to black people. Its revenge.
@pythonsnake 2) Hes incarcerating and kidnapping, torturing and drugging black and brown children because they are latino and at the same time welcoming European immigrants and kids with open arms.
@pythonsnake 1) Hes erasing progress by returning federal courts to whiter Emmitt Till days and ensuring white dominance for a generation.

@pythonsnake All I know is the internet is undefeated. 😅
https://t.co/cLUsyHah2E

@pythonsnake Trump is clearly dumb but they knew that before they elected him. My point is I'm unimpressed with anonymous letters, if he's that bad, pull out the constitution and follow the steps. #shrug

@pythonsnake Annnd heres your girl using the situation to promote her book. Smh, I know foreign countries are looking at us like wth is going on in America?
https://t.co/xKbN6di6O0

@pythonsnake We have a constitution. If they really feel he is unhinged, mentally unfit and has the intelligence of a 5 year old they can remove him from office rather than calling the NYT from the servants bathroom. There are legit steps that can be taken.

@pythonsnake Talking about him anonymously drives him batshit but this is a cya move. They are trying to differentiate themselves as the "good ones" on the shit hole so we forget they are part of said shit  hole. I'm here for the fuckery but the writer is no hero.

@pythonsnake I knew it! 😂😂😂😂😂

https://t.co/WEDmrN9zhT
@pythonsnake Its all bullshit but leaks drive him crazy. Im sure hes throwing things.

@pythonsnake Meanwhile someone in the WH wrote this anonymous article claiming they are secretly saving the country fro him. So whatever Kim is doing, I hope it happens quick cus Trump will either have a heart attack, end up in jail or the psych ward. https://t.co/Xp2ql8WVze

@pythonsnake Ben? Do you see the turnover in that WH? Ben is hiding under his desk. He's been under there for a year and some change now. Trump probably forgot all about him and that's the only reason he is still there!
@pythonsnake Nah Steve Harvey said meeting with Trump was a mistake and he shouldve listened to his wife. He spoke about it.

@pythonsnake Omarosa was there to get paid. Period. But I refuse to believe she is the reason they couldnt meet with him. Locking her in a closet for an hour or two aint that hard.

https://t.co/3TVo3swSdm

@pythonsnake I totally agree but here's an example of how his black supporters/employees used her as an excuse for why they couldnt meet with him. 

https://t.co/IxhvrOeO4A
@pythonsnake They had a party when Omarosa got kicked out but do you see them making any moves? I mean the so called mean witch is gone so what's the problem now?

@pythonsnake You must not know many black republicans. LOL When it was going on I had the same reaction as you. What they did to save face was blame Omarosa and they went to the media and called her out. Which I thought was worse because by trying to protect Trump they made her look powerful.

@pythonsnake As far as I know black libs met with him twice about prison reform and both meetings resulted in nothing.  Black republicans tried to meet with him and he didnt take the meeting at all. It is true a lot of people will not meet with him but others did. There are photos.
@pythonsnake Well Kim is republican and they all are both reality stars. They can relate to each other. He makes her look smart, she makes him look human. Its a win win. I hope it works out.
@pythonsnake This sounds petty. I'm sorry it does. If he was this much of a bitch he shouldntve ran. And he is not a victim, he worked hard for his reputation. It is well deserved. LOL

@pythonsnake John Gray and others was just there. Paula White brought them to discuss prison reform except they were not allowed to ask questions. Their vist was an embarrasing photo op. Maybe he has a soft spot for white girls who make sex tapes. He said he & Melania watched Paris Hilton's.
